channel.title: How do i make it so a custom item goes on ur head not on the ur hand lol
channel.description:
How do u make it so ur custom item
for example in this case, barrows p hat
goes on ur head not on ur weilding arm so i cant wear a weapon
please say
give example plaz

item.title: How do i make it so a custom item goes on ur head not on the ur hand lol
item.dc:creator: @Psycotix Psycotix
item.description:
@Psycotix wrote:

Add it to items1.java, or items2.java.
Or items.java, maybe even itemhandler.java… I don’t know I don’t really do much of these servers

Read full topic
